title: Did Bannon say he put Fashie's head and FBI director on Vieques?
subtitle: The CEO of Bodcast and Brittbart were described as loyal to Trump.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: The campaign adviser of former United States President Donald Trump Steve Bannon called for a "second period" to start shooting by the director of NIH Dr. Anthony Fossie and Director of the FBI Christopher Ray, adding that he would put their "heads on arrows" as a warning.
